technische-universitat-munchen-(tum).candidature: 4. Application documents Application forms and a list of supplementary documents can be found here under "Apply at TUM": https://www.international.tum.de/en/global/exchangestudents/study-at-tum-with-erasmus-or-semp/ The process: Students need to... 1. Fill in the application form in the online portal. 2. Upload all necessary documents and finalize the process in the portal as requested there (uploaded documents should not be write protected in any case). 3. Submit the data via the portal to TUM. 4. Send an e-mail to meierl@zv.tum.de and attach the PDF version of the "Full application" (this "Full application" will be automatically generated in the portal and must include the online form and all uploaded documents) as soon as they submitted the application via the portal. This is really important, as without getting this e-mail or getting it after the deadline, this will lead to a rejection of the application! Deadline: Students need to submit their documents via the portal and send the just mentioned "Full application" via e-mail latest by May 15, 2023!

https://www.international.tum.de/en/exchangestudents/study-at-tum-with-erasmus-or-semp/
Housing situation in Munich: Very tense situation regarding accommodation in Munich. The application for an Erasmus stay at TUM does not enclose the supply of a hostel room / Service package offered by the Studentenwerk or TUM. You need to search independently for accommodation on the private market. Students should only start apartment hunting after they received their acceptance letter from TUM.
Useful tips for finding rooms on the private market in Munich (single rooms, apartments, WGs ("Wohngemeinschaften") can be found here under "Accommodation search tips for students participating in other exchange programs, e.g. Erasmus+": https://www.international.tum.de/en/accommodation/

instituto-tecnologico-de-buenos-aires.candidature: Una vez cerrado el periodo de nominacion, ITBA contactara directamente via mail a los alumnos nominados. Compartiremos con ellos un link a nuestra plataforma para que realicen su aplicacion online donde deberan adjuntar los siguientes documentos: * Fotocopia de las dos primeras paginas del pasaporte. * Carta de motivacion explicando las razones por las que el alumno desea estudiar en el ITBA. * Certificado(s) analitico(s) de notas original(es) firmado(s) y sellado(s) por la universidad de origen. * Plan de estudios (listado de asignaturas a cursar durante el semestre en ITBA). En caso el alumno haya sido nominado por su universidad de origen para cursar un ano academico en el ITBA, en la aplicacion solicitamos incluir unicamente las materias que el alumno vaya a cursar durante su primer semestre en el ITBA. * Formulario medico (template sera enviado via mail) * Examen diagnostico de espanol (template sera enviado via mail). Dicho examen debe ser incluido en la aplicacion unicamente si el idioma nativo no es el espanol. * Los alumnos nominados a una doble titulacion deberan incluir tambien certificado de graduacion original del colegio secundario. Importante: Solicitamos por favor no enviar documentacion via mail.

universitat-politecnica-de-valencia,-upv.candidature: Online exchange application: http://www.opii.upv.es/incomings/ (AIRE) REQUIRED DOCUMENTS: Language certificate (official certificate or a document with current level issued by home university): Spanish language: B1 Spanish for courses in Spanish English language: B2 English for courses in English If students have both certificates, they must merge them and upload them into a single document. WARNING: Our tuition is mainly in Spanish. English courses have great demand and very limited places for enrolment, so we can't guarantee availability in the English courses. If students do not have any Spanish certificate, there is a certificate that they can obtain online. It is called SIELE and you can find more information here https://siele.org/ And if they want to learn Spanish there is an EDX course : https://www.edx.org/es/professional-certificate/upvalenciax-basic-spanish?index=spanish_product&queryID=6a945246f1ce46f821d2ab22c3fc2e58&position=1 Motivation letter: explain studies at home university, interests, motivation... Transcript of records: Master's students must upload Master + Bachelor ToR. Printed application document signed by coordinator: you can get the PDF document clicking in the "Print Application" orange button that you can find in the AIRE platform. You have to add a picture and it has to be signed by the student and by the coordinator.

university-of-sheffield.candidature: After you have nominated your students, we will contact them to invite them to complete their application. We will provide full application instructions in our communications to them. This year, all students will be required to provide the following documents: * Up to date copy of the transcript (translated into English) o The document should show University branding, rather than being an online printout o Please provide your students with this document as soon as possible, as applications will not be reviewed until the document is uploaded * English language qualification (high school transcript if English is the first language) o Students coming from a European partner for one semester only and who will be entering the UK on a Visitor Visa who do not have an accepted English language qualification can request to provide a supporting letter from the sending institution confirming the students' language. Please email globalopps@sheffield.ac.uk if you would like to request a template of this letter to complete for your student. o Students coming for the full academic year and/or entering the UK on a Student Visa must provide one of our accepted qualifications o Further information can be found here: https://www.sheffield.ac.uk/globalopps/inbound/apply/entry-requirements * Portfolio (Architecture students only)

ceske-vysoke-uceni-technicke-v-praze,-ct.candidature: Il faut envoyer le lien de candidature suivant aux nomines : https://mobility.cvut.cz/registration/ Application form printed out from the on-line registration fully stamped and signed by home university. The documents could be sent only like scanned copies directly to "Lucie Bilova" ; till the deadline. We don't ask for the hardcopies. Some useful information is also available in our FAQ here: https://international.cvut.cz/students/incoming-students/erasmus-and-exchange/faq/

L'inscription administrative se fera a l'arrovee de 'etudiant a Galatasaray.
